com.plotsquared.iserver.object

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plotsquared.iserver.object.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProviderFactory<Request>, VariableProvider, Validatable

    public final class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProviderFactory<Request>, VariableProvider, Validatable
    The HTTP Request Class

    This is generated when a client connects to the web server, and contains the information needed for the server to generate a proper response. This is what everything is based around!

      • getHeader

        public java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String name)
        Get a request header. These are sent by the client, and are not to be confused with the response headers.
        Parameters:
        name - Header Name
        Returns:
        The header value, if the header exists. Otherwise an empty string will be returned.
